title: Eva Mendes admits she goes to Supercuts 'every once in awhile'
text:
She's a screen star partnered with one of Hollywood's most sought-after heartthrobs, Ryan Gosling.

But Eva Mendes revealed a more pedestrian side of her lifestyle on Monday as she took a selfie in a beauty chair at Supercuts with wet hair.

The 45-year-old Hitch star gazed into her smartphone's camera placed on her lap with a straight face for the photo that garnered over 33K likes within its first two hours of posting.

Getting real: Eva Mendes revealed a more pedestrian side of her lifestyle on Monday as she took a selfie in a beauty chair at Supercuts with wet hair

She captioned the photo: 'Ok this is a terrible angle but thought you guys would like to know that yea, I stop into @supercuts every once in awhile. Y que?!'

Her down-to-earth post comes as she recently admitted that parenting alongside partner Ryan Gosling, 38, is 'beautiful and maddening' to Access Daily.

The actress shares daughters Esmeralda Amada, five, and Amada Lee, three, with Gosling.

Coupled: Her down-to-earth post comes as she recently admitted that parenting alongside partner Ryan Gosling, 38, is 'beautiful and maddening' to Access Daily

She continued to the outlet: 'It’s so hard, of course. But it’s like that feeling of … you end your day, you put them to bed and Ryan and I kind of look at each other like, "We did it, we did it. We came out relatively unscathed."'

'I’m so thankful I have the opportunity to be home with them,' Mendes said of taking a pause from acting to spend time with her daughters.

It's unclear when Mendes will return to the screen, as her last acting credit was for 2014's Lost River.

But she expressed an interest in collaborating with her beau in the future for a second time after their co-starring roles in The Place Beyond the Pines.

'He’s just such a creative genius. There’s always stuff going on there, but I would love to at any time,' she said. 'I love it. I love it.'

Mendes and Gosling have been dating since 2011.
